mapper.select: SELECT TRIM(T0A9.T0A9001) AS T0A9001, T0A9.T0A9002 AS T0A9002, T0A9.T0A9101 AS T0A9101, T0A9.T0A9102 AS T0A9102, T0A9.T0A9103 AS T0A9103, T0A9.T0A9201 AS T0A9201, T0A9.T0A9202 AS T0A9202 FROM T0A9 WHERE T0A9.T0A9001 = #{stationCd} AND T0A9.T0A9101 = 1 AND T0A9.T0A9102 = #{contractSeq}
